abilities.name: Tranquil Flower
abilities.text: Once during your turn, if this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, you may heal 60 damage from 1 of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Dangerous Toxwhip
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused and Poisoned.

abilities.name: Glittering Star Pattern
abilities.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon during your turn, you may switch in 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon that has 90 HP or less remaining to the Active Spot.

attacks.name: Swift
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance, or by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Collect
attacks.text: Draw a card.

attacks.name: Bind Down
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon can't retreat.

abilities.name: Selective Slime
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may flip a coin. If heads, choose Burned, Confused, or Poisoned. Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now affected by that Special Condition.

attacks.name: Miasma Wind
attacks.text: This attack does 100 damage for each Special Condition affecting your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Nosh
attacks.text: Heal 40 damage from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Reaping Dash
attacks.text: Before doing damage, discard all Pokémon Tools and Special Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Ambush
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

attacks.name: Double Spin
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Breezy Gift
attacks.text: Put this Pokémon and all attached cards into your deck. If you do, search your deck for up to 3 cards and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Coated Attack
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from Basic Pokémon.

abilities.name: Ripening Charge
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may attach a Basic Grass Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Pokémon. If you attached Energy to a Pokémon in this way, heal 30 damage from that Pokémon.

attacks.name: Syrup Storm
attacks.text: This attack does 30 more damage for each Grass Energy attached to all of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Mega Drain
attacks.text: Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Burning Run
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 60 more damage.

attacks.name: Call for Family
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Basic Pokémon and put it onto your Bench. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Searing Flame
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Ember
attacks.text: Discard an Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Sudden Scorching
attacks.text: Your opponent discards a card from their hand. If this Pokémon evolved from Salandit during this turn, your opponent discards 2 more cards.

attacks.name: Flamethrower
attacks.text: Discard an Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Ring of Fire
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned. During your opponent's next turn, that Pokémon can't retreat.

attacks.name: Inferno Onrush
attacks.text: This Pokémon also does 60 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Quick Attack
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 more damage.

attacks.name: Flare Strike
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't use Flare Strike.

attacks.name: Garnet Volley
attacks.text: This attack does 180 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

abilities.name: Solid Shell
abilities.text: This Pokémon takes 30 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Twin Cannons
attacks.text: Discard up to 2 Basic Water Energy cards from your hand. This attack does 140 damage for each card you discarded in this way.

attacks.name: Power Splash
attacks.text: This attack does 40 damage for each Energy attached to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Larimar Rain
attacks.text: Look at the top 20 cards of your deck and attach any number of Energy cards you find there to your Pokémon in any way you like. Shuffle the other cards back into your deck.

attacks.name: Bubble Beam
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Return
attacks.text: You may draw cards until you have 6 cards in your hand.

attacks.name: Splashing Turn
attacks.text: Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

abilities.name: Primal Knowledge
abilities.text: Attacks used by your Pokémon do 30 more damage to your opponent's Active Evolution Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Shifting Shuriken
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 100 more damage.

abilities.name: Food Prep
abilities.text: Attacks used by this Pokémon cost Colorless less for each Kofu card in your discard pile.

attacks.name: Haymaker
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't use Haymaker.

abilities.name: Impervious Shell
abilities.text: Prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from your opponent's Pokémon if that damage is 200 or more.

attacks.name: Hard Crunch
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon already has any damage counters on it, this attack does 80 more damage.

abilities.name: Food Prep
abilities.text: Attacks used by this Pokémon cost Colorless less for each Kofu card in your discard pile.

attacks.name: Sonic Edge
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Collect
attacks.text: Draw a card.

attacks.name: Unleash Lightning
attacks.text: During your next turn, your Pokémon can't attack. (This includes new Pokémon that come into play.)

attacks.name: Double Voltage
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Disorienting Flash
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused. Put 8 damage counters instead of 3 on that Pokémon for this Special Condition.

attacks.name: Thunderous Bolt
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.

attacks.name: Jolting Charge
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 2 Basic Grass Energy cards and up to 2 Basic Lightning Energy cards and attach them to your Pokémon in any way you like. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Charged Web
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a Pokémon ex or Pokémon V, this attack does 110 more damage.

attacks.name: Fulgurite
attacks.text: Discard all Energy from this Pokémon. During your opponent's next turn, they can't play any Item cards from their hand.

attacks.name: Parallel Placement
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 3 Charjabug and put them onto your Bench. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Volt Switch
attacks.text: Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Lightning Pokémon.

attacks.name: Electrifying Chance
attacks.text: If you have exactly 1 Prize card remaining, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Combat Thunder
attacks.text: This attack does 20 more damage for each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Targeted Spark
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Dangle Tail
attacks.text: Put a Pokémon from your discard pile into your hand.

attacks.name: Seek Inspiration
attacks.text: Discard the top card of your deck, and if that card is a Pokémon that doesn't have a Rule Box, choose 1 of its attacks and use it as this attack. (Pokémon ex, Pokémon V, etc. have Rule Boxes.)

attacks.name: Expand
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes 10 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Everyone Explode Now
attacks.text: This attack does 50 damage for each of your Drifloon and Drifblim in play. This attack also does 30 damage to each of your Drifloon and Drifblim. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Ominous Eyes
attacks.text: Put 3 damage counters on 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

attacks.name: Flower Shower
attacks.text: Each player draws 3 cards.

attacks.name: Play Rough
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Colorful Confection
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 5 Pokémon that are the same type as any Basic Energy attached to this Pokémon, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Pleasant Aroma
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Basic Pokémon and put it onto your Bench. Then, shuffle your deck.

abilities.name: Time to Chow Down
abilities.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon during your turn, you may heal all damage from each of your Evolution Pokémon. If you healed any damage in this way, discard all Energy from those Pokémon.

attacks.name: Wonder Shine
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Adjusted Horn
attacks.text: If you don't have the same number of cards in your hand as your opponent, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Reckless Charge
attacks.text: This Pokémon also does 10 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Growl
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, attacks used by the Defending Pokémon do 40 less damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Bone Vengeance
attacks.text: If any of your Benched Cubone have any damage counters on them, this attack does 120 more damage.

attacks.name: Destructive Horn
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

abilities.name: Wide Wall
abilities.text: As long as this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, whenever your opponent plays a Supporter card from their hand, prevent all effects of that card done to all of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Drill Run
attacks.text: Discard an Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Calm Mind
attacks.text: Heal 20 damage from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Double Smash
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 40 damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Chi-Atsu
attacks.text: Put damage counters on your opponent's Active Pokémon until its remaining HP is 50.

attacks.name: Yoga Kick
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.

attacks.name: Knock Off
attacks.text: Discard a random card from your opponent's hand.

attacks.name: Gale Roundhouse
attacks.text: If your opponent has 5 or fewer cards in their hand, this attack does 60 more damage.

attacks.name: Leer
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Diffuse Reflection
attacks.text: This attack does 40 damage for each Special Energy attached to all of your opponent's Pokémon.

attacks.name: Form Ranks
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 2 Basic Pokémon and put them onto your Bench. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: All-Out Attack
attacks.text: If this Pokémon used Form Ranks during your last turn, this attack does 90 more damage.

abilities.name: Salty Body
abilities.text: This Pokémon can't be affected by any Special Conditions.

attacks.name: Block Hammer
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes 60 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Resolute Fang
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a Pokémon ex, this attack does 70 more damage.

attacks.name: Super Poison Breath
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Devouring Mouth
attacks.text: If this Pokémon has more Energy attached than your opponent's Active Pokémon, this attack does 160 more damage.

attacks.name: Venomous Hit
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Pull
attacks.text: Switch in 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon to the Active Spot.

attacks.name: Tantrum
attacks.text: This Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Goad 'n' Grab
attacks.text: Switch out your opponent's Active Pokémon to the Bench. (Your opponent chooses the new Active Pokémon.) If you do, this attack does 160 damage to the new Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Knuckle Sandwich
attacks.text: Discard 2 Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Reckless Charge
attacks.text: This Pokémon also does 20 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Swelling Wish
attacks.text: Attach a Basic Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Allure
attacks.text: Draw a card.

attacks.name: Iron Tackle
attacks.text: This Pokémon also does 20 damage to itself.

abilities.name: Emergency Rotation
abilities.text: Once during your turn, if this Pokémon is in your hand and your opponent has any Stage 2 Pokémon in play, you may put this Pokémon onto your Bench.

attacks.name: Hyper Ray
attacks.text: Discard all Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Knickknack Carrying
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Pokémon Tool card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Reforged Axe
attacks.text: Before doing damage, discard all Pokémon Tools from this Pokémon. If you can't discard any, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Iron Swing
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 100 damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Raging Hammer
attacks.text: This attack does 10 more damage for each damage counter on this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Metal Bridge
abilities.text: All of your Pokémon that have Metal Energy attached have no Retreat Cost.

attacks.name: Iron Blaster
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.

abilities.name: Pummeling Payback
abilities.text: If this Pokémon is damaged by an attack from your opponent's Pokémon (even if this Pokémon is Knocked Out), put 2 damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon for each Metal Energy attached to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Rock Tomb
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon can't retreat.

attacks.name: Thunderburst Storm
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon for each Energy attached to this Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Destructive Horn
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Call for Family
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Basic Pokémon and put it onto your Bench. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Triple Stab
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage for each heads.

abilities.name: Jewel Seeker
abilities.text: Once during your turn, when you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, if you have any Tera Pokémon in play, you may search your deck for up to 2 Trainer cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Nyan Roll
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage from and effects of attacks done to this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Fan Call
abilities.text: Once during your first turn, you may search your deck for up to 3 Colorless Pokémon with 100 HP or less, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck. You can't use more than 1 Fan Call Ability during your turn.

attacks.name: Assault Landing
attacks.text: If there is no Stadium in play, this attack does nothing.

abilities.name: Curly Wall
abilities.text: As long as you have at least 1 other Bouffalant in play, all of your Basic Colorless Pokémon take 60 less damage from attacks from your opponent's Pokémon (after applying Weakness and Resistance). The effect of Curly Wall doesn't stack.

attacks.name: Boundless Power
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.

attacks.name: Storm Barrier
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes 50 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Send Back
attacks.text: Switch out your opponent's Active Pokémon to the Bench. (Your opponent chooses the new Active Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Aero Chase
attacks.text: If the Retreat Cost of your opponent's Active Pokémon is ColorlessColorless or more, this attack does 110 more damage.

attacks.name: Knock Over
attacks.text: You may discard a Stadium in play.

abilities.name: Soft Wool
abilities.text: This Pokémon takes 30 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Knock Over
attacks.text: You may discard a Stadium in play.

attacks.name: Unified Beatdown
attacks.text: If you go second, you can't use this attack during your first turn. This attack does 30 damage for each of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Crown Opal
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from Basic non-Colorless Pokémon.

name: Antique Cover Fossil

abilities.name: Protective Cover
abilities.text: Prevent all effects of attacks used by your opponent's Pokémon done to this Pokémon. (Damage is not an effect.) Illustrated by AYUMI ODASHIMA

rules: Play this card as if it were a 60-HP Basic Colorless Pokémon. This card can't be affected by any Special Conditions and can't retreat.At any time during your turn, you may discard this card from play.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Antique Root Fossil

abilities.name: Primal Root
abilities.text: As long as this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, attacks used by your opponent's Basic Pokémon cost Colorless more. Illustrated by AYUMI ODASHIMA

rules: Play this card as if it were a 60-HP Basic Colorless Pokémon. This card can't be affected by any Special Conditions and can't retreat.At any time during your turn, you may discard this card from play.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Area Zero Underdepths
rules: You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play. A Stadium with the same name can't be played.

name: Briar
rules: You can use this card only if your opponent has exactly 2 Prize cards remaining.During this turn, if your opponent's Active Pokémon is Knocked Out by damage from an attack used by your Tera Pokémon, take 1 more Prize card.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Crispin
rules: Search your deck for up to 2 Basic Energy cards of different types, reveal them, and put 1 of them into your hand. Attach the other to 1 of your Pokémon. Then, shuffle your deck.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Deluxe Bomb
rules: If the Pokémon this card is attached to is in the Active Spot and is damaged by an attack from your opponent's Pokémon (even if this Pokémon is Knocked Out), put 12 damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon. If you placed any damage counters in this way, discard this card.

name: Glass Trumpet
rules: You can use this card only if you have any Tera Pokémon in play.Choose up to 2 of your Benched Colorless Pokémon and attach a Basic Energy card from your discard pile to each of them.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Grand Tree
rules: You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play. A Stadium with the same name can't be played.

name: Gravity Gemstone
rules: As long as the Pokémon this card is attached to is in the Active Spot, the Retreat Cost of both Active Pokémon is Colorless more.

name: Kofu
rules: Put 2 cards from your hand on the bottom of your deck in any order. If you put 2 cards on the bottom of your deck in this way, draw 4 cards. (If you can't put 2 cards from your hand on the bottom of your deck, you can't use this card.)
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Lacey
rules: Shuffle your hand into your deck. Then, draw 4 cards. If your opponent has 3 or fewer Prize cards remaining, draw 8 cards instead.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Occa Berry
rules: If the Pokémon this card is attached to is damaged by an attack from your opponent's Fire Pokémon, it takes 60 less damage (after applying Weakness and Resistance), and discard this card.

name: Payapa Berry
rules: If the Pokémon this card is attached to is damaged by an attack from your opponent's Psychic Pokémon, it takes 60 less damage (after applying Weakness and Resistance), and discard this card.

name: Sparkling Crystal
rules: When the Tera Pokémon this card is attached to uses an attack, that attack costs 1 Energy less. (The Energy can be of any type.)
